trans-unit.source: Represents a service that generates a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"></xref> that is based on the current internal parser context.
trans-unit.target: 表示產生的服務<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"></xref>目前的剖析器內部內容為依據。

trans-unit.source: An internal factory class implements this service for .NET Framework XAML Services.
trans-unit.target: 內部的 factory 類別會實作這個.NET Framework XAML 服務的服務。

trans-unit.source: By obtaining the service from an existing XAML object writer, you can call <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory.GetXamlObjectWriter%2A> to construct a new compatible XAML object writer.
trans-unit.target: 藉由從現有的 XAML 物件寫入器取得的服務，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory.GetXamlObjectWriter%2A>來建構新的相容 XAML 物件寫入器。</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory.GetXamlObjectWriter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The factory-constructed object writer can resume writing to the object graph after the first write operation is suspended.
trans-unit.target: Factory 建構的物件寫入器可以在之後第一個寫入作業已暫停，繼續寫入物件圖形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings"></xref> from the original internal parser context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings"></xref>從原始的內部剖析器內容。

trans-unit.source: The settings from the original internal parser context.
trans-unit.target: 從原始的內部剖析器內容設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"></xref> that is based on active XAML schema context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"></xref>也就是根據使用中的 XAML 結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: The settings to use for construction and initialization of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定為用來建構並初始化<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"></xref> that has the specified settings.
